CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The Stille polycondensation reaction of donor unit 5 and acceptor units 18-21 was carried out under the catalyst of Pd(PPh 3 ) 4 in chlorobenzene solutions at 150 °C for 3 days that could afford the corresponding polymers as a dark green solid.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| donor unit 5 |
| acceptor units 18-21 |
| Pd(PPh3)4 |
| chlorobenzene |

The paragraph mentions several materials: donor unit 5, acceptor units 18-21, Pd(PPh3)4, chlorobenzene, and polymers. However, the text only describes the appearance of the resulting polymers as a dark green solid. Therefore, the only valid entities that can be identified as "Material Name" are donor unit 5, acceptor units 18-21, Pd(PPh3)4, and chlorobenzene.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Pd(PPh3)4 |
| chlorobenzene |

After reviewing the paragraph, I have determined that only two entities can be clearly identified as "Material Name": Pd(PPh3)4 and chlorobenzene. The other entities, donor unit 5 and acceptor units 18-21, are not clearly described as materials in the paragraph.
